about.details:
Incorporated in 2017, Focus Suits Solutions & Services Ltd is Market Research Company based in Bangalore having presence across 18 major countries in Asia, Middle East and Latin America. They offers Fieldwork, Panel Research and primary data collection services to the other Market Research Companies. They are a member of ESOMAR and CASRO.

They have team of project managers who handled the project execution of different fieldwork across various industries like healthcare, automobiles, IT and telecommunications,
FMCG, Retail etc. They help their clients and assist them in making strategic decisions in their respective lines of business.

Company's team of project managers have, over the years, built considerable expertise in project execution of different fieldwork across various industries like healthcare, automobiles, IT and telecommunications, FMCG, Retail etc. A high proportion of their revenues come from foreign markets.

The primary services they offer:
A) Qualitative Fieldwork
B) Sensorial Fieldwork
C) Usability Fieldwork
D) Data Acquisition and Data Analysis

contactDetails.full_address: Focus Suits Solutions & Services Ltd, 2nd Flr Kalpak Arcade No.46/17, Church Street, Bangalore - 560001

faqs.question: What is the Focus Suits Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Focus Suits Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 3608000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.49 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹18 per share. The minimum order quantity is 8000.

The IPO opens on January 30, 2018, and closes on February 1, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Focus Suits Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Focus Suits Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Focus Suits Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Focus Suits Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Focus Suits Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Focus Suits Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Focus Suits Solutions IPO opens on January 30, 2018 and closes on February 1, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Focus Suits Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Focus Suits Solutions IPO lot size is 8000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Focus Suits Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Focus Suits Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
